/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp, reassoc.1, elementwise]
theorem homology.π_map (p : α.right = β.left) :
    «expr ≫ » (homology.π f g w) (homology.map w w' α β p) = «expr ≫ » (kernel_subobject_map β) (homology.π f' g' w') :=
  by simp only [homology.π, homology.map, cokernel.π_desc]
#align homology.π_map homology.π_map

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp, reassoc.1, elementwise]
theorem homology.π_desc {D : V} (k : «expr ⟶ » (kernel_subobject g : V) D)
    (p : «expr ≫ » (image_to_kernel f g w) k = 0) : «expr ≫ » (homology.π f g w) (homology.desc f g w k p) = k := by
  simp [homology.π, homology.desc]
#align homology.π_desc homology.π_desc

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/-- Prefer `image_to_kernel`. -/
@[simp]
theorem subobject_of_le_as_image_to_kernel (w : «expr ≫ » f g = 0) (h) :
    subobject.of_le (image_subobject f) (kernel_subobject g) h = image_to_kernel f g w :=
  rfl
#align subobject_of_le_as_image_to_kernel subobject_of_le_as_image_to_kernel

@[simp]
theorem homology.map_id : homology.map w w ((«expr𝟙») _) ((«expr𝟙») _) rfl = («expr𝟙») _ := by
  ext <;> simp only [homology.π_map, kernel_subobject_map_id, category.id_comp, category.comp_id]

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp, reassoc.1, elementwise]
theorem homology.map_desc (p : α.right = β.left) {D : V} (k : «expr ⟶ » (kernel_subobject g' : V) D)
    (z : «expr ≫ » (image_to_kernel f' g' w') k = 0) :

@[reassoc.1]
theorem homology.map_comp (p₁ : α₁.right = β₁.left) (p₂ : α₂.right = β₂.left) :
    «expr ≫ » (homology.map w₁ w₂ α₁ β₁ p₁) (homology.map w₂ w₃ α₂ β₂ p₂) =

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
theorem image_to_kernel_zero_right [has_images V] {w} :
    image_to_kernel f (0 : «expr ⟶ » B C) w =
      «expr ≫ » (image_subobject f).arrow (inv (kernel_subobject (0 : «expr ⟶ » B C)).arrow) :=
  by
  ext
  simp

@[simp]
theorem image_to_kernel_zero_left [has_kernels V] [has_zero_object V] {w} :
    image_to_kernel (0 : «expr ⟶ » A B) g w = 0 := by

  simp
#align image_to_kernel_zero_left image_to_kernel_zero_left

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp]
theorem image_to_kernel_epi_comp {Z : V} (h : «expr ⟶ » Z A) [Epi h] (w) :
    image_to_kernel («expr ≫ » h f) g w =
      «expr ≫ » (subobject.of_le _ _ (image_subobject_comp_le h f))
        (image_to_kernel f g ((cancel_epi h).mp (by simpa using w : «expr ≫ » h («expr ≫ » f g) = «expr ≫ » h 0))) :=
  by
  ext
  simp
#align image_to_kernel_epi_comp image_to_kernel_epi_comp
image_to_kernel_comp_right:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem image_to_kernel_comp_right {D : V} (h : «expr ⟶ » C D) (w : «expr ≫ » f g = 0) :
    image_to_kernel f («expr ≫ » g h) (by simp [reassoc_of w]) =
      «expr ≫ » (image_to_kernel f g w) (subobject.of_le _ _ (kernel_subobject_comp_le g h)) :=
  by
  ext
  simp
#align image_to_kernel_comp_right image_to_kernel_comp_right

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp]
theorem image_to_kernel_comp_mono {D : V} (h : «expr ⟶ » C D) [Mono h] (w) :
    image_to_kernel f («expr ≫ » g h) w =
      «expr ≫ »
        (image_to_kernel f g ((cancel_mono h).mp (by simpa using w : «expr ≫ » («expr ≫ » f g) h = «expr ≫ » 0 h)))
        (subobject.iso_of_eq _ _ (kernel_subobject_comp_mono g h)).inv :=
  by
  ext
  simp
#align image_to_kernel_comp_mono image_to_kernel_comp_mono

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem image_to_kernel_comp_left {Z : V} (h : «expr ⟶ » Z A) (w : «expr ≫ » f g = 0) :
    image_to_kernel («expr ≫ » h f) g (by simp [w]) =
      «expr ≫ » (subobject.of_le _ _ (image_subobject_comp_le h f)) (image_to_kernel f g w) :=
  by
  ext
  simp

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp]
theorem image_to_kernel_comp_hom_inv_comp [has_equalizers V] [has_images V] {Z : V} {i : «expr ≅ » B Z} (w) :
    image_to_kernel («expr ≫ » f i.hom) («expr ≫ » i.inv g) w =
      «expr ≫ » (image_subobject_comp_iso _ _).hom
        («expr ≫ » (image_to_kernel f g (by simpa using w)) (kernel_subobject_iso_comp i.inv g).inv) :=
  by
  ext
  simp

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp, reassoc.1, elementwise]
theorem image_to_kernel_arrow (w : «expr ≫ » f g = 0) :
    «expr ≫ » (image_to_kernel f g w) (kernel_subobject g).arrow = (image_subobject f).arrow := by
  simp [image_to_kernel]
#align image_to_kernel_arrow image_to_kernel_arrow

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp]
theorem image_to_kernel'_kernel_subobject_iso (w : «expr ≫ » f g = 0) :
    «expr ≫ » (image_to_kernel' f g w) (kernel_subobject_iso g).inv =
      «expr ≫ » (image_subobject_iso f).inv (image_to_kernel f g w) :=
  by
  ext
  simp [image_to_kernel']
#align image_to_kernel'_kernel_subobject_iso image_to_kernel'_kernel_subobject_iso
image_subobject_map_comp_image_to_kernel:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/-- Given compatible commutative squares between
a pair `f g` and a pair `f' g'` satisfying `f ≫ g = 0` and `f' ≫ g' = 0`,
the `image_to_kernel` morphisms intertwine the induced map on kernels and the induced map on images.
-/
@[reassoc.1]
theorem image_subobject_map_comp_image_to_kernel (p : α.right = β.left) :
    «expr ≫ » (image_to_kernel f g w) (kernel_subobject_map β) =
      «expr ≫ » (image_subobject_map α) (image_to_kernel f' g' w') :=
  by
  ext
  simp [p]
#align image_subobject_map_comp_image_to_kernel image_subobject_map_comp_image_to_kernel

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp]
theorem image_subobject_iso_image_to_kernel' (w : «expr ≫ » f g = 0) :
    «expr ≫ » (image_subobject_iso f).hom (image_to_kernel' f g w) =
      «expr ≫ » (image_to_kernel f g w) (kernel_subobject_iso g).hom :=
  by
  ext
  simp [image_to_kernel']
#align image_subobject_iso_image_to_kernel' image_subobject_iso_image_to_kernel'
image_le_kernel:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/

theorem image_le_kernel (w : «expr ≫ » f g = 0) : image_subobject f ≤ kernel_subobject g :=
  image_subobject_le_mk _ _ (kernel.lift _ _ w) (by simp)
#align image_le_kernel image_le_kernel
factor_thru_image_subobject_comp_image_t:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
-- This is less useful as a `simp` lemma than it initially appears,
-- as it "loses" the information the morphism factors through the image.
theorem factor_thru_image_subobject_comp_image_to_kernel (w : «expr ≫ » f g = 0) :
    «expr ≫ » (factor_thru_image_subobject f) (image_to_kernel f g w) = factor_thru_kernel_subobject g f w :=
  by
  ext
  simp
#align factor_thru_image_subobject_comp_image_to_kernel factor_thru_image_subobject_comp_image_to_kernel
ext:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/-- To check two morphisms out of `homology f g w` are equal, it suffices to check on cycles. -/
@[ext]
theorem homology.ext {D : V} {k k' : «expr ⟶ » (homology f g w) D}
    (p : «expr ≫ » (homology.π f g w) k = «expr ≫ » (homology.π f g w) k') : k = k' :=
  by
  ext
  exact p
#align homology.ext homology.ext
condition:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp]
theorem homology.condition : «expr ≫ » (image_to_kernel f g w) (homology.π f g w) = 0 :=
  cokernel.condition _
#align homology.condition homology.condition
comp_right_eq_comp_left:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/-- Auxiliary lemma for homology computations. -/
theorem homology.comp_right_eq_comp_left {V : Type _} [Category V] {A₁ B₁ C₁ A₂ B₂ C₂ A₃ B₃ C₃ : V}
    {f₁ : «expr ⟶ » A₁ B₁} {g₁ : «expr ⟶ » B₁ C₁} {f₂ : «expr ⟶ » A₂ B₂} {g₂ : «expr ⟶ » B₂ C₂} {f₃ : «expr ⟶ » A₃ B₃}
    {g₃ : «expr ⟶ » B₃ C₃} {α₁ : «expr ⟶ » (arrow.mk f₁) (arrow.mk f₂)} {β₁ : «expr ⟶ » (arrow.mk g₁) (arrow.mk g₂)}
    {α₂ : «expr ⟶ » (arrow.mk f₂) (arrow.mk f₃)} {β₂ : «expr ⟶ » (arrow.mk g₂) (arrow.mk g₃)} (p₁ : α₁.right = β₁.left)
    (p₂ : α₂.right = β₂.left) : («expr ≫ » α₁ α₂).right = («expr ≫ » β₁ β₂).left := by
  simp only [comma.comp_left, comma.comp_right, p₁, p₂]
#align homology.comp_right_eq_comp_left homology.comp_right_eq_comp_left
